page.title: 12RECREATION,SWIMMING
page.content: There is a small swimming bath in the village which is attached to Defynnog County Primary School.It was opened in 1975. Building of it was financed by public subscription and it is a public bath. However by arrangement with Powys Education Committee, the bath is only available to the public during the evening and at weekends in term time. During school hours it is used by different schools in the district. The bath is heated by burning wood from a sawmill on the other side of the road.
